dialogue.name: EyeballTv0_0
dialogue.text: An enormous, wet eyeball stares out into empty space from atop a tripod. Its pupil dilates and contracts sporadically. Suddenly, it whirls to fixate its gaze on... you. The pupil's contractions cease, and the void within beckons to you.

dialogue.name: EyeballTv0_0R1A
dialogue.text: Throbbing red veins fringe the milky orb. The iris shimmers with moisture, the ridges of its musculature clearly visible.

dialogue.name: EyeballTv0_0R1B
dialogue.text: Your vision swirls around the eyeball as if being flushed inwards, towards the gaping pupil. You feel an overpowering urge to stare into its darkness...

dialogue.name: EyeballTv0_1
dialogue.text: You cannot resist the compulsion to meet the thing's gaze. You peer into the void and fixate on the blackness. After a few moments, you see...

dialogue.name: EyeballTv0_2
dialogue.text: ...Nothing. Nothing but emptiness dwells within the thing's dark pupil. You frown with disappointment, and the urge to stare melts from your mind.

dialogue.name: EyeballTv1_0
dialogue.text: You deliver a swift kick to the eyeball as its gaze turns to you. Its glossy surface begins to swell with blood at the site of its injury. That'll show it for messing with you.

dialogue.name: EyeballTv2_0
dialogue.text: The eyeball averts its gaze from you. The pupil dilates wide, and droplets of moisture bead on its surface. Is it... afraid?
